title: GKV Smart Energy corporate website (5-page, responsive, SEO-friendly)

requirements.text: Implement the overall site shell with a consistent header navigation and footer across all pages for “GKV Smart Energy”, including a mobile-friendly navigation pattern (e.g., hamburger menu/drawer) and clear active-state indication for the current page.

quotes: PAGES REQUIRED: 1. Home 2. About Us 3. Services 4. Projects / Portfolio 5. Contact Us
DESIGN REQUIREMENTS: - Easy navigation menu - Fully mobile & tablet responsive

acceptanceCriteria: A header navigation is present on all pages with links to Home, About Us, Services, Projects/Portfolio, Contact Us.
Navigation is usable on mobile (no horizontal overflow; menu is reachable and tappable).
A footer is present on all pages and includes company contact details (address/phone/email placeholders if needed).

requirements.text: Create the Home page with the specified sections and copy: hero (headline, subheading, two CTA buttons), introduction paragraph, service highlight cards (4 items), “Why Choose GKV Smart Energy” section, customer testimonials section, and footer contact details.

quotes: HOME PAGE: - Hero section headline: “GKV Smart Energy – Powering a Sustainable Future” - Subheading: Smart, reliable and affordable solar energy solutions - Call-to-action buttons: “Get Free Consultation” and “Contact Us” - Introduction paragraph about rooftop solar and clean energy benefits - Service highlights in cards: • Residential Solar Solutions • Commercial & Industrial Solar • Rooftop Solar Installation • Maintenance & Support - Why Choose GKV Smart Energy section - Customer testimonials - Footer with company contact details

acceptanceCriteria: Home page renders the exact hero headline and CTA button labels as provided.
Service highlights appear as 4 distinct cards with the provided titles.
“Why Choose GKV Smart Energy” section and testimonials are present with professional, simple English copy.
CTAs are clickable and navigate to the Contact page and/or contact form section (no broken links).

requirements.text: Create the About Us page with sections for company overview, Vision, Mission, and experience/expertise/reliability content in a professional, trustworthy tone (simple English).

quotes: ABOUT US: - Overview of GKV Smart Energy - Vision: Promote clean, renewable, and cost-effective energy - Mission: Deliver high-quality solar solutions with customer satisfaction - Experience, expertise, and reliability content

acceptanceCriteria: About Us page includes clearly labeled sections for Overview, Vision, Mission, and Experience/Expertise/Reliability.
Vision and Mission statements match the intent provided and are written in simple, business-focused English.
Page uses semantic headings (H1 for page title; H2/H3 for sections).

requirements.text: Create the Services page listing the required service offerings, presented in a scannable layout (cards or sections) with short descriptions for each service.

quotes: SERVICES PAGE: - Residential Rooftop Solar Systems - Commercial & Industrial Solar Power Plants - Solar Panel Installation & Commissioning - Solar System Maintenance & AMC - Government Solar Scheme Assistance (Subsidy Support)

acceptanceCriteria: All five services are present with the exact service names (minor punctuation variations allowed).
Each service includes a brief, professional description oriented to Indian residential/commercial/industrial customers.
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Create the Projects / Portfolio page with a completed-project showcase including an image gallery layout and per-project info areas for project capacity and client benefits.

quotes: PROJECTS / PORTFOLIO: - Showcase completed solar rooftop projects - Image gallery layout - Project capacity and client benefits

acceptanceCriteria: Projects/Portfolio page contains a gallery-style grid of project items with images (using generated placeholder images if real photos are not provided).
Each project item displays capacity (e.g., kW) and at least 1–2 client benefit bullets.
Gallery is responsive (grid adapts to mobile/tablet/desktop).

requirements.text: Create the Contact Us page with office address section, phone number, email address, a contact form (Name, Mobile, Email, Message), and a Google Map embed placeholder area.

quotes: CONTACT US: - Office address section - Phone number - Email address - Contact form (Name, Mobile, Email, Message) - Google Map embed placeholder

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays address, phone, and email in a clearly readable layout.
Contact form includes the four specified fields and basic validation (required fields; email format; mobile numeric/length check).
A visible “Google Map” placeholder block exists (embed can be a placeholder if no map URL is provided).

requirements.text: Persist contact form submissions in the Motoko canister (single-actor backend) and wire the frontend form submit to call the backend; show a success/failure status to the user without page reload.
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the contact form triggers a backend call and returns a success response when stored.
The UI displays a non-technical success message on successful submission and a non-technical error message on failure.
Backend stores submissions with at least: name, mobile, email, message, and a timestamp.
No external email/SMS service is used; submissions are stored in-canister.

requirements.text: Apply the requested visual design system across the site: clean professional UI, white background with green & blue solar theme, modern typography, consistent spacing, and fully mobile/tablet responsive layouts.

quotes: DESIGN REQUIREMENTS: - Clean and professional UI - White background with green & blue solar theme - Modern typography - Fully mobile & tablet responsive

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent design language (colors, typography, button styles, card styles).
Color palette is predominantly white with green & blue accents (no heavy dark theme).
Typography is modern and legible with consistent heading/body hierarchy.
Responsive behavior verified for common widths (mobile, tablet, desktop) with no overflow issues.

requirements.text: Implement SEO-friendly on-page structure and content: semantic headings per page, keyword-aware copy where natural, and page-level metadata (title/description) for Home, About, Services, Projects, and Contact.

quotes: SEO REQUIREMENTS: - SEO-friendly headings and content - Keywords: solar energy company, rooftop solar India, smart energy solutions - Optimized page structure

acceptanceCriteria: Each page has a single H1 and logical H2/H3 structure.
Copy naturally includes the target keywords without keyword stuffing.
Each page sets an appropriate document title and meta description reflecting the page content.

requirements.text: Generate and include solar-themed static images for the Home hero and Projects gallery, and render them as static assets in the frontend (do not serve images from the backend).

quotes: Create a professional, modern, mobile-responsive solar energy company website similar in structure, layout, and content style to nspg.in.

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are saved under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend UI.
Home page hero includes a solar-themed visual.
Projects gallery uses the generated placeholder project images.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); add migration.mo only if an upgrade-safe state migration is required.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
No external databases or third-party auth providers; Internet Identity only if authentication is later added (not required here).
No external email/SMS integrations for contact form; store submissions on-canister.
nonGoals: Implementing user authentication/admin dashboard for viewing contact submissions.
Integrating live Google Maps API (only an embed placeholder is required unless a specific embed URL is provided).
Adding payments, chat, real-time features, or third-party CRM integrations.
Cloning nspg.in exactly; only similar structure/layout/content style is required.
